channel.title: Potions easy fix

item.title: Potions easy fix
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

You’re using insidia base aren’t you :P. Yes, it has that problem. What I did was just made it so after you drink a dose of (4), it just gives you a dose of (2). To do that, heres the code.

case 15308: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15310, slot, 0, false); break; case 15309: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15310, slot, 0, false); break; case 15310: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15311, slot, 0, false); break; case 15311: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 229, slot, 0, false); break;
I couldn’t tell you how to change the 15309 to the model of extreme attack (3). It’s in the client somewhere but I don’t know how to change it. Oh well. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Potions easy fix
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

it pulls up a deadly slayer cape. instead. i found items.cft and 15309 IS (3) but its giving that
what i have here:

case 15308: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15309, slot, 0, false); break; case 15309: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15310, slot, 0, false); break; case 15310: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15311, slot, 0, false); break; case 15311: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 229, slot, 0, false); break;

item.title: Potions easy fix
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

Fixed.

case 15308: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15309, slot, 0, false); break; case 15309: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15310, slot, 0, false); break; case 15310: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15311, slot, 0, false); break; case 15311: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 229, slot, 0, false); break;

When you drink the potion, you had it set to give you another (4) dose potion. Enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: Potions easy fix
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

please help with this, if someone drinks an extreme attack, it stays at dose 4
here is where it is in potions.java, everything looks right with the cases and everything. there are breaks set correctly in the switch so i’m not too sure what the issue could be.

case 15308: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15308, slot, 0, false); break; case 15309: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15310, slot, 0, false); break; case 15310: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 15311, slot, 0, false); break; case 15311: //Extreme Attack drinkExtremePotion(itemId, 229, slot, 0, false); break;

Read full topic
